meanings.definition: The act of assigning or designating something.
meanings.sent1: Her designment of tasks was clear and organized.
meanings.sent2: The designment of roles in the group project was fair.
meanings.sent3: His designment of chores made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The designment of seats on the bus was like a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The designment of colors in the painting was striking.

meanings.sent1: The designment for the party was to have fun.
meanings.sent2: She followed the designment for the new marketing campaign.
meanings.sent3: His designment to eat all the cookies was unsuccessful.
meanings.sent4: The designment to reach the summit felt like a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The designment to surprise her was successful.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a design or layout.
meanings.sent1: The designment of the website was visually appealing.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the designment of her new room.
meanings.sent3: The designment of the garden was a creative endeavor.
meanings.sent4: His designment of the logo was innovative.
meanings.sent5: The designment of the building was impressive.
